text.__SUMMARY__: Shorea peltata (called, along with some other species in the genus Shorea, Yellow Meranti) is a species of plant in the Dipterocarpaceae family. It is a tree found in Sumatra, Peninsular Malaysia and Borneo.
text.Sources: Ashton, P. (1998). "Shorea peltata". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T31973A9671665. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T31973A9671665.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
